info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 3:40PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Pueblo County through 415 PM MDT... At 340 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pueblo, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. Accumulating hail may create hazardous conditions on area roads. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pueblo, Pueblo Reservoir, Salt Creek, Blende, Pueblo West, Pueblo Depot and Avondale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
